NotificationTemplate.subject: OpenIZ Account {{ $UserName }} Security Change
NotificationTemplate.body:
Hello,

This is a notification that the user account {{ $UserName}} was changed by {{ $authenticatedUser }} on {{ $UpdatedTime }}.

The system changes made to this object are attached to this e-mail message. These detail the exact fields changed, and the values changed from / to. To assist in reading the file:

  • Lines beginning with ??? indicates the system performed a query/check/validation against a field value
  • Lines beginning with === indicate that an existing value was replaced
  • Lines beginning with +++ indicate an addition of information
  • Lines beginning with --- indicate the removal of information
